name: MediaStreamTrack.getConstraints
description: The getConstraints() method of the MediaStreamTrack interface returns a MediaTrackConstraints object containing the set of constraints most recently established for the track using a prior call to applyConstraints(). These constraints indicate values and ranges of values that the Web site or application has specified are required or acceptable for the included constrainable properties.

refs.name: Media Capture and Streams
refs.description: The definition of 'getConstraints()' in Media Capture and Streams.
